comments:
Description:
Errors happen when click button in cheat sheet of My first report template.

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report from My First Report template.
2. Click button in Introduction step to begin
3. Click button in Start the tutorial step

Expected result:
No errors.

Actual result:
